================
LGA1200
================

Introduction
================

Successor of the :doc:`LGA1151v2` socket, predecessor of :doc:`LGA1700`.
Uses the :doc:`/Memory/DDR4` memory standard.

Key Facts & Figures
====================

.. list-table::
   :widths: 50 75
   :header-rows: 0

   * - Microarchitecture:
     - :doc:`/Intel/Microarchs/Skylake`
   * - Codenames:
     - Comet Lake, Rocket Lake
   * - Process nodes:
     - Intel 14nm
   * - Core counts:
     - 4, 6, 8, 10 (SMT available in select SKUs)
   * - Native FSB:
     - 100 MHz
   * - Release Year:
     - 2019

Benching it
================

TBA
